Flowhub Documentation and Support

Flowhub is web-based IDE for flow-based programming. It is built on NoFlo.js for both client and server. It can connect to any language or environment that can talk the FBP Network Protocol.

Flowhub is currently in beta testing. Please refer to the FAQ for more information.

Support

  • For support and discussion about NoFlo and flow-based programming in general, see the links at noflojs.org/support/
  • For Flowhub billing issues, email support@thegrid.io
